rawLines.text: good morning and welcome to the

please signal the conference specialist

i would now like to turn today's call
over to Martha Gander director of invest
in investor relations BlackBerry please
go ahead thank you Rob good morning
everyone and welcome to BlackBerry's

executive officer John Giamato and Chief

our cautionary note regarding

excluding the results of Silance
Business which are included within
discontinued operations and with that
let me now turn the call over to John
thanks Martha and thanks to everyone for

marked another significant step forward
in what was a transformative year for
Blackberry we closed the win-win
transaction with Arctic Wolf for the

beat expectations across the board
total company revenue beat the top end

million revenue for the QX division beat

million likewise the secure
communications division finished the

and finally licensing had a better

million in terms of profitability
BlackBerry beat guidance for adjusted

2025 beat guidance and expectations at

total cash and investments increased by

various

our new secure communications division
